EXPOST

Oct 2018 - Mar 2019

The project was initiated by a legislative obligation to comply with the MiFID II law. The latter requires asset management companies to produce reports detailing the different costs associated with portfolio management to provide greater transparency for investors. In order to be in compliance with this law, CANDRIAM developed a new tool, the main feature of which was to produce these mandatory ex-post reports.

I had the opportunity to assist the lead business analyst on this project with respect to his day-to-day tasks and, more specifically, on specifying the requirements. I was also designated as Quality Assurance (QA) manager to design and lead the testing process, but also to implement a new project and testing methodology across the whole CANDRIAM’s IT department.

Activities

  • Requirements and business rules management
  • Requirements modelling using UML and BPMN
  • Design and documentation of use cases
  • Support for the functional analysis
  • Change management: implementation of a new testing methodology at CANDRIAM
  • Reorganization of the project and testing items in Azure Devops
  • Design of a master test plan (test scope, infrastructure needs and planning, …)
  • Test cases design
  • Requirements testing coverage through a traceability matrix (RTM) design
